Package Logic

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
Logic.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController class manages the game logic and coordinates interactions between various game elements. It controls player movement, monster behavior, game state, and level progression.

      Parameters:
      xMove - movement on x axis
      yMove - movement on y axis
      monster - monster that is performing the movement
      Returns:
      is frozen at the location the monster is moving to
